lines: I used to have a great post in the city markets. Then one day, my supervising officer decides he doesn't like the arrangement I had with the merchants.
Long story short, they sent me here to protect this humble settlement, along with Leofric. And here we shall remain─until we die or resign, whichever comes first.
That was some nasty work in the caves. Good that you did it, though. Wouldn't want our friends to get even more carried away.
People ought to be more grateful for what they've got, don't you think?
Y-You shouldn't be here. There'll be hells to pay if word spreads.
Maybe you can keep us safe when you're here, but when you're not?
Glad to have things back to normal, eh? No more unenforceable orders and all that.
It was getting to be a bit uncomfortable, lying every time someone came through asking after you.

obj.n: イシュガルド戦勝祝賀会
エンシェントバックラー
ヴァーミリオンホーバージョン
ヴァーミリオンスカート
